382   /**
383    * Starts a HRegionServer at the default location
384    *
385    * @param conf
386    * @throws IOException
387    * @throws InterruptedException
388    */
389   public HRegionServer(Configuration conf)
390   throws IOException, InterruptedException {
391     this.fsOk = true;
392     this.conf = conf;
393     // Set how many times to retry talking to another server over HConnection.
394     HConnectionManager.setServerSideHConnectionRetries(this.conf, LOG);
395     this.isOnline = false;
396     checkCodecs(this.conf);
397 
398     // do we use checksum verfication in the hbase? If hbase checksum verification
399     // is enabled, then we automatically switch off hdfs checksum verification.
400     this.useHBaseChecksum = conf.getBoolean(
401       HConstants.HBASE_CHECKSUM_VERIFICATION, false);
402 
403     // Config'ed params
404     this.numRetries = conf.getInt("hbase.client.retries.number", 10);
405     this.threadWakeFrequency = conf.getInt(HConstants.THREAD_WAKE_FREQUENCY,
406       10 * 1000);
407     this.msgInterval = conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.msginterval", 3 * 1000);
408 
409     this.sleeper = new Sleeper(this.msgInterval, this);
410 
411     this.maxScannerResultSize = conf.getLong(
412       HConstants.HBASE_CLIENT_SCANNER_MAX_RESULT_SIZE_KEY,
413       HConstants.DEFAULT_HBASE_CLIENT_SCANNER_MAX_RESULT_SIZE);
414 
415     this.numRegionsToReport = conf.getInt(
416       "hbase.regionserver.numregionstoreport", 10);
417 
418     this.rpcTimeout = conf.getInt(
419       HConstants.HBASE_RPC_TIMEOUT_KEY,
420       HConstants.DEFAULT_HBASE_RPC_TIMEOUT);
421 
422     this.abortRequested = false;
423     this.stopped = false;
424 
425     // Server to handle client requests.
426     String hostname = conf.get("hbase.regionserver.ipc.address",
427       Strings.domainNamePointerToHostName(DNS.getDefaultHost(
428         conf.get("hbase.regionserver.dns.interface", "default"),
429         conf.get("hbase.regionserver.dns.nameserver", "default"))));
430     int port = conf.getInt(HConstants.REGIONSERVER_PORT,
431       HConstants.DEFAULT_REGIONSERVER_PORT);
432     // Creation of a HSA will force a resolve.
433     InetSocketAddress initialIsa = new InetSocketAddress(hostname, port);
434     if (initialIsa.getAddress() == null) {
435       throw new IllegalArgumentException("Failed resolve of " + initialIsa);
436     }
437     this.rpcServer = HBaseRPC.getServer(this,
438       new Class<?>[]{HRegionInterface.class, HBaseRPCErrorHandler.class,
439         OnlineRegions.class},
440         initialIsa.getHostName(), // BindAddress is IP we got for this server.
441         initialIsa.getPort(),
442         conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.handler.count", 10),
443         conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.metahandler.count", 10),
444         conf.getBoolean("hbase.rpc.verbose", false),
445         conf, HConstants.QOS_THRESHOLD);
446     if (rpcServer instanceof HBaseServer) server = (HBaseServer) rpcServer;
447     // Set our address.
448     this.isa = this.rpcServer.getListenerAddress();
449 
450     this.rpcServer.setErrorHandler(this);
451     this.rpcServer.setQosFunction(new QosFunction());
452     this.startcode = System.currentTimeMillis();
453 
454     // login the zookeeper client principal (if using security)
455     ZKUtil.loginClient(this.conf, "hbase.zookeeper.client.keytab.file",
456       "hbase.zookeeper.client.kerberos.principal", this.isa.getHostName());
457 
458     // login the server principal (if using secure Hadoop)
459     User.login(this.conf, "hbase.regionserver.keytab.file",
460       "hbase.regionserver.kerberos.principal", this.isa.getHostName());
461     regionServerAccounting = new RegionServerAccounting();
462     cacheConfig = new CacheConfig(conf);
463   }

468   /**
469    * Run test on configured codecs to make sure supporting libs are in place.
470    * @param c
471    * @throws IOException
472    */
473   private static void checkCodecs(final Configuration c) throws IOException {
474     // check to see if the codec list is available:
475     String [] codecs = c.getStrings("hbase.regionserver.codecs", (String[])null);
476     if (codecs == null) return;
477     for (String codec : codecs) {
478       if (!CompressionTest.testCompression(codec)) {
479         throw new IOException("Compression codec " + codec +
480           " not supported, aborting RS construction");
481       }
482     }
483   }

485 
486   @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
487   private @interface QosPriority {
488     int priority() default 0;
489   }
490 
491   /**
492    * Utility used ensuring higher quality of service for priority rpcs; e.g.
493    * rpcs to .META. and -ROOT-, etc.
494    */
495   class QosFunction implements Function<Writable,Integer> {
496     private final Map<String, Integer> annotatedQos;
497 
498     public QosFunction() {
499       Map<String, Integer> qosMap = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
500       for (Method m : HRegionServer.class.getMethods()) {
501         QosPriority p = m.getAnnotation(QosPriority.class);
502         if (p != null) {
503           qosMap.put(m.getName(), p.priority());
504         }
505       }
506 
507       annotatedQos = qosMap;
508     }
509 
510     public boolean isMetaTable(byte[] regionName) {
511       HRegion region;
512       try {
513         region = getRegion(regionName);
514       } catch (NotServingRegionException ignored) {
515         return false;
516       }
517       return region.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable();
518     }
519 
520     @Override
521     public Integer apply(Writable from) {
522       if (!(from instanceof Invocation)) return HConstants.NORMAL_QOS;
523 
524       Invocation inv = (Invocation) from;
525       String methodName = inv.getMethodName();
526 
527       Integer priorityByAnnotation = annotatedQos.get(methodName);
528       if (priorityByAnnotation != null) {
529         return priorityByAnnotation;
530       }
531 
532       // scanner methods...
533       if (methodName.equals("next") || methodName.equals("close")) {
534         // translate!
535         Long scannerId;
536         try {
537           scannerId = (Long) inv.getParameters()[0];
538         } catch (ClassCastException ignored) {
539           // LOG.debug("Low priority: " + from);
540           return HConstants.NORMAL_QOS;
541         }
542         String scannerIdString = Long.toString(scannerId);
543         RegionScanner scanner = scanners.get(scannerIdString);
544         if (scanner != null && scanner.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable()) {
545           // LOG.debug("High priority scanner request: " + scannerId);
546           return HConstants.HIGH_QOS;
547         }
548       } else if (inv.getParameterClasses().length == 0) {
549        // Just let it through.  This is getOnlineRegions, etc.
550       } else if (inv.getParameterClasses()[0] == byte[].class) {
551         // first arg is byte array, so assume this is a regionname:
552         if (isMetaTable((byte[]) inv.getParameters()[0])) {
553           // LOG.debug("High priority with method: " + methodName +
554           // " and region: "
555           // + Bytes.toString((byte[]) inv.getParameters()[0]));
556           return HConstants.HIGH_QOS;
557         }
558       } else if (inv.getParameterClasses()[0] == MultiAction.class) {
559         MultiAction<?> ma = (MultiAction<?>) inv.getParameters()[0];
560         Set<byte[]> regions = ma.getRegions();
561         // ok this sucks, but if any single of the actions touches a meta, the
562         // whole
563         // thing gets pingged high priority. This is a dangerous hack because
564         // people
565         // can get their multi action tagged high QOS by tossing a Get(.META.)
566         // AND this
567         // regionserver hosts META/-ROOT-
568         for (byte[] region : regions) {
569           if (isMetaTable(region)) {
570             // LOG.debug("High priority multi with region: " +
571             // Bytes.toString(region));
572             return HConstants.HIGH_QOS; // short circuit for the win.
573           }
574         }
575       }
576       // LOG.debug("Low priority: " + from.toString());
577       return HConstants.NORMAL_QOS;
578     }
579   }
580 
581   /**
582    * All initialization needed before we go register with Master.
583    *
584    * @throws IOException
585    * @throws InterruptedException
586    */
587   private void preRegistrationInitialization(){
588     try {
589       initializeZooKeeper();
590 
591       clusterId = new ClusterId(zooKeeper, this);
592       if(clusterId.hasId()) {
593         conf.set(HConstants.CLUSTER_ID, clusterId.getId());
594       }
595 
596       initializeThreads();
597       int nbBlocks = conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.nbreservationblocks", 4);
598       for (int i = 0; i < nbBlocks; i++) {
599         reservedSpace.add(new byte[HConstants.DEFAULT_SIZE_RESERVATION_BLOCK]);
600       }
601 
602       this.rpcEngine = HBaseRPC.getProtocolEngine(conf);
603     } catch (Throwable t) {
604       // Call stop if error or process will stick around for ever since server
605       // puts up non-daemon threads.
606       this.rpcServer.stop();
607       abort("Initialization of RS failed.  Hence aborting RS.", t);
608     }
609   }

611   /**
612    * Bring up connection to zk ensemble and then wait until a master for this
613    * cluster and then after that, wait until cluster 'up' flag has been set.
614    * This is the order in which master does things.
615    * Finally put up a catalog tracker.
616    * @throws IOException
617    * @throws InterruptedException
618    */
619   private void initializeZooKeeper() throws IOException, InterruptedException {
620     // Open connection to zookeeper and set primary watcher
621     this.zooKeeper = new ZooKeeperWatcher(conf, REGIONSERVER + ":" +
622       this.isa.getPort(), this);
623 
624     // Create the master address manager, register with zk, and start it.  Then
625     // block until a master is available.  No point in starting up if no master
626     // running.
627     this.masterAddressManager = new MasterAddressTracker(this.zooKeeper, this);
628     this.masterAddressManager.start();
629     blockAndCheckIfStopped(this.masterAddressManager);
630 
631     // Wait on cluster being up.  Master will set this flag up in zookeeper
632     // when ready.
633     this.clusterStatusTracker = new ClusterStatusTracker(this.zooKeeper, this);
634     this.clusterStatusTracker.start();
635     blockAndCheckIfStopped(this.clusterStatusTracker);
636 
637     // Create the catalog tracker and start it;
638     this.catalogTracker = new CatalogTracker(this.zooKeeper, this.conf, this);
639     catalogTracker.start();
640 
641     // watch for snapshots
642     try {
643       this.snapshotManager = new RegionServerSnapshotManager(this);
644     } catch (KeeperException e) {
645       this.abort("Failed to reach zk cluster when creating snapshot handler.");
646     }
647   }
648 
649   /**
650    * Utilty method to wait indefinitely on a znode availability while checking
651    * if the region server is shut down
652    * @param tracker znode tracker to use
653    * @throws IOException any IO exception, plus if the RS is stopped
654    * @throws InterruptedException
655    */
656   private void blockAndCheckIfStopped(ZooKeeperNodeTracker tracker)
657       throws IOException, InterruptedException {
658     while (tracker.blockUntilAvailable(this.msgInterval, false) == null) {
659       if (this.stopped) {
660         throw new IOException("Received the shutdown message while waiting.");
661       }
662     }
663   }
664 
665   /**
666    * @return False if cluster shutdown in progress
667    */
668   private boolean isClusterUp() {
669     return this.clusterStatusTracker.isClusterUp();
670   }
671 
672   private void initializeThreads() throws IOException {
673     // Cache flushing thread.
674     this.cacheFlusher = new MemStoreFlusher(conf, this);
675 
676     // Compaction thread
677     this.compactSplitThread = new CompactSplitThread(this);
678 
679     // Background thread to check for compactions; needed if region
680     // has not gotten updates in a while. Make it run at a lesser frequency.
681     int multiplier = this.conf.getInt(HConstants.THREAD_WAKE_FREQUENCY +
682       ".multiplier", 1000);
683     this.compactionChecker = new CompactionChecker(this,
684       this.threadWakeFrequency * multiplier, this);
685 
686     // Health checker thread.
687     int sleepTime = this.conf.getInt(HConstants.HEALTH_CHORE_WAKE_FREQ,
688       HConstants.DEFAULT_THREAD_WAKE_FREQUENCY);
689     if (isHealthCheckerConfigured()) {
690       healthCheckChore = new HealthCheckChore(sleepTime, this, getConfiguration());
691     }
692 
693     this.leases = new Leases((int) conf.getLong(
694         HConstants.HBASE_REGIONSERVER_LEASE_PERIOD_KEY,
695         HConstants.DEFAULT_HBASE_REGIONSERVER_LEASE_PERIOD),
696         this.threadWakeFrequency);
697 
698     // Create the thread for the ThriftServer.
699     if (conf.getBoolean("hbase.regionserver.export.thrift", false)) {
700       thriftServer = new HRegionThriftServer(this, conf);
701       thriftServer.start();
702       LOG.info("Started Thrift API from Region Server.");
703     }
704   }
705 
706   /**
707    * The HRegionServer sticks in this loop until closed.
708    */
709   @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
710   public void run() {
711     try {
712       // Do pre-registration initializations; zookeeper, lease threads, etc.
713       preRegistrationInitialization();
714     } catch (Throwable e) {
715       abort("Fatal exception during initialization", e);
716     }
717 
718     try {
719       // Try and register with the Master; tell it we are here.  Break if
720       // server is stopped or the clusterup flag is down or hdfs went wacky.
721       while (keepLooping()) {
722         MapWritable w = reportForDuty();
723         if (w == null) {
724           LOG.warn("reportForDuty failed; sleeping and then retrying.");
725           this.sleeper.sleep();
726         } else {
727           handleReportForDutyResponse(w);
728           break;
729         }
730       }
731       registerMBean();
732 
733       // start the snapshot handler, since the server is ready to run
734       this.snapshotManager.start();
735 
736       // We registered with the Master.  Go into run mode.
737       long lastMsg = 0;
738       long oldRequestCount = -1;
739       // The main run loop.
740       while (!this.stopped && isHealthy()) {
741         if (!isClusterUp()) {
742           if (isOnlineRegionsEmpty()) {
743             stop("Exiting; cluster shutdown set and not carrying any regions");
744           } else if (!this.stopping) {
745             this.stopping = true;
746             LOG.info("Closing user regions");
747             closeUserRegions(this.abortRequested);
748           } else if (this.stopping) {
749             boolean allUserRegionsOffline = areAllUserRegionsOffline();
750             if (allUserRegionsOffline) {
751               // Set stopped if no requests since last time we went around the loop.
752               // The remaining meta regions will be closed on our way out.
753               if (oldRequestCount == this.requestCount.get()) {
754                 stop("Stopped; only catalog regions remaining online");
755                 break;
756               }
757               oldRequestCount = this.requestCount.get();
758             } else {
759               // Make sure all regions have been closed -- some regions may
760               // have not got it because we were splitting at the time of
761               // the call to closeUserRegions.
762               closeUserRegions(this.abortRequested);
763             }
764             LOG.debug("Waiting on " + getOnlineRegionsAsPrintableString());
765           }
766         }
767         long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
768         if ((now - lastMsg) >= msgInterval) {
769           doMetrics();
770           tryRegionServerReport();
771           lastMsg = System.currentTimeMillis();
772         }
773         if (!this.stopped) this.sleeper.sleep();
774       } // for
775     } catch (Throwable t) {
776       if (!checkOOME(t)) {
777         abort("Unhandled exception: " + t.getMessage(), t);
778       }
779     }
780     // Run shutdown.
781     if (mxBean != null) {
782       MBeanUtil.unregisterMBean(mxBean);
783       mxBean = null;
784     }
785     if (this.thriftServer != null) this.thriftServer.shutdown();
786     this.leases.closeAfterLeasesExpire();
787     this.rpcServer.stop();
788     if (this.splitLogWorker != null) {
789       splitLogWorker.stop();
790     }
791     if (this.infoServer != null) {
792       LOG.info("Stopping infoServer");
793       try {
794         this.infoServer.stop();
795       } catch (Exception e) {
796         e.printStackTrace();
797       }
798     }
799     // Send cache a shutdown.
800     if (cacheConfig.isBlockCacheEnabled()) {
801       cacheConfig.getBlockCache().shutdown();
802     }
803 
804     // Send interrupts to wake up threads if sleeping so they notice shutdown.
805     // TODO: Should we check they are alive? If OOME could have exited already
806     if (this.cacheFlusher != null) this.cacheFlusher.interruptIfNecessary();
807     if (this.compactSplitThread != null) this.compactSplitThread.interruptIfNecessary();
808     if (this.hlogRoller != null) this.hlogRoller.interruptIfNecessary();
809     if (this.compactionChecker != null)
810       this.compactionChecker.interrupt();
811     if (this.healthCheckChore != null) {
812       this.healthCheckChore.interrupt();
813     }
814 
815     try {
816       if (snapshotManager != null) snapshotManager.stop(this.abortRequested);
817     } catch (IOException e) {
818       LOG.warn("Failed to close snapshot handler cleanly", e);
819     }
820 
821     if (this.killed) {
822       // Just skip out w/o closing regions.  Used when testing.
823     } else if (abortRequested) {
824       if (this.fsOk) {
825         closeUserRegions(abortRequested); // Don't leave any open file handles
826       }
827       LOG.info("aborting server " + this.serverNameFromMasterPOV);
828     } else {
829       closeUserRegions(abortRequested);
830       closeAllScanners();
831       LOG.info("stopping server " + this.serverNameFromMasterPOV);
832     }
833     // Interrupt catalog tracker here in case any regions being opened out in
834     // handlers are stuck waiting on meta or root.
835     if (this.catalogTracker != null) this.catalogTracker.stop();
836 
837     // stop the snapshot handler, forcefully killing all running tasks
838     try {
839       if (snapshotManager != null) snapshotManager.stop(this.abortRequested || this.killed);
840     } catch (IOException e) {
841       LOG.warn("Failed to close snapshot handler cleanly", e);
842     }
843 
844     // Closing the compactSplit thread before closing meta regions
845     if (!this.killed && containsMetaTableRegions()) {
846       if (!abortRequested || this.fsOk) {
847         if (this.compactSplitThread != null) {
848           this.compactSplitThread.join();
849           this.compactSplitThread = null;
850         }
851         closeMetaTableRegions(abortRequested);
852       }
853     }
854 
855     if (!this.killed && this.fsOk) {
856       waitOnAllRegionsToClose(abortRequested);
857       LOG.info("stopping server " + this.serverNameFromMasterPOV +
858         "; all regions closed.");
859     }
860 
861     //fsOk flag may be changed when closing regions throws exception.
862     if (!this.killed && this.fsOk) {
863       closeWAL(abortRequested ? false : true);
864     }
865 
866     // Make sure the proxy is down.
867     this.hbaseMaster = null;
868     this.rpcEngine.close();
869     this.leases.close();
870 
871     if (!killed) {
872       join();
873     }
874 
875     try {
876       deleteMyEphemeralNode();
877     } catch (KeeperException e) {
878       LOG.warn("Failed deleting my ephemeral node", e);
879     }
880     this.zooKeeper.close();
881     LOG.info("stopping server " + this.serverNameFromMasterPOV +
882       "; zookeeper connection closed.");
883 
884     LOG.info(Thread.currentThread().getName() + " exiting");
885   }
886 
887   private boolean containsMetaTableRegions() {
888     return onlineRegions.containsKey(HRegionInfo.ROOT_REGIONINFO.getEncodedName())
889         || onlineRegions.containsKey(HRegionInfo.FIRST_META_REGIONINFO.getEncodedName());
890   }
891 
892   private boolean areAllUserRegionsOffline() {
893     if (getNumberOfOnlineRegions() > 2) return false;
894     boolean allUserRegionsOffline = true;
895     for (Map.Entry<String, HRegion> e: this.onlineRegions.entrySet()) {
896       if (!e.getValue().getRegionInfo().isMetaTable()) {
897         allUserRegionsOffline = false;
898         break;
899       }
900     }
901     return allUserRegionsOffline;
902   }
903 
904   void tryRegionServerReport()
905   throws IOException {
906     HServerLoad hsl = buildServerLoad();
907     // Why we do this?
908     this.requestCount.set(0);
909     try {
910       this.hbaseMaster.regionServerReport(this.serverNameFromMasterPOV.getVersionedBytes(), hsl);
911     } catch (IOException ioe) {
912       if (ioe instanceof RemoteException) {
913         ioe = ((RemoteException)ioe).unwrapRemoteException();
914       }
915       if (ioe instanceof YouAreDeadException) {
916         // This will be caught and handled as a fatal error in run()
917         throw ioe;
918       }
919       // Couldn't connect to the master, get location from zk and reconnect
920       // Method blocks until new master is found or we are stopped
921       getMaster();
922     }
923   }
924 
925   HServerLoad buildServerLoad() {
926     Collection<HRegion> regions = getOnlineRegionsLocalContext();
927     TreeMap<byte [], HServerLoad.RegionLoad> regionLoads =
928       new TreeMap<byte [], HServerLoad.RegionLoad>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
929     for (HRegion region: regions) {
930       regionLoads.put(region.getRegionName(), createRegionLoad(region));
931     }
932     MemoryUsage memory =
933       ManagementFactory.getMemoryMXBean().getHeapMemoryUsage();
934     return new HServerLoad(requestCount.get(),(int)metrics.getRequests(),
935       (int)(memory.getUsed() / 1024 / 1024),
936       (int) (memory.getMax() / 1024 / 1024), regionLoads,
937       this.hlog.getCoprocessorHost().getCoprocessors());
938   }
939 
940   String getOnlineRegionsAsPrintableString() {
941     StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
942     for (HRegion r: this.onlineRegions.values()) {
943       if (sb.length() > 0) sb.append(", ");
944       sb.append(r.getRegionInfo().getEncodedName());
945     }
946     return sb.toString();
947   }

949   /**
950    * Wait on regions close.
951    */
952   private void waitOnAllRegionsToClose(final boolean abort) {
953     // Wait till all regions are closed before going out.
954     int lastCount = -1;
955     long previousLogTime = 0;
956     Set<String> closedRegions = new HashSet<String>();
957     while (!isOnlineRegionsEmpty()) {
958       int count = getNumberOfOnlineRegions();
959       // Only print a message if the count of regions has changed.
960       if (count != lastCount) {
961         // Log every second at most
962         if (System.currentTimeMillis() > (previousLogTime + 1000)) {
963           previousLogTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
964           lastCount = count;
965           LOG.info("Waiting on " + count + " regions to close");
966           // Only print out regions still closing if a small number else will
967           // swamp the log.
968           if (count < 10 && LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
969             LOG.debug(this.onlineRegions);
970           }
971         }
972       }
973       // Ensure all user regions have been sent a close. Use this to
974       // protect against the case where an open comes in after we start the
975       // iterator of onlineRegions to close all user regions.
976       for (Map.Entry<String, HRegion> e : this.onlineRegions.entrySet()) {
977         HRegionInfo hri = e.getValue().getRegionInfo();
978         if (!this.regionsInTransitionInRS.containsKey(hri.getEncodedNameAsBytes())
979             && !closedRegions.contains(hri.getEncodedName())) {
980           closedRegions.add(hri.getEncodedName());
981           // Don't update zk with this close transition; pass false.
982           closeRegion(hri, abort, false);
983         }
984       }
985       // No regions in RIT, we could stop waiting now.
986       if (this.regionsInTransitionInRS.isEmpty()) {
987         if (!isOnlineRegionsEmpty()) {
988           LOG.info("We were exiting though online regions are not empty, because some regions failed closing");
989         }
990         break;
991       }
992       Threads.sleep(200);
993     }
994   }
995 
996   private void closeWAL(final boolean delete) {
997     try {
998       if (this.hlog != null) {
999         if (delete) {
1000           hlog.closeAndDelete();
1001         } else {
1002           hlog.close();
1003         }
1004       }
1005     } catch (Throwable e) {
1006       LOG.error("Close and delete failed", RemoteExceptionHandler.checkThrowable(e));
1007     }
1008   }

1010   private void closeAllScanners() {
1011     // Close any outstanding scanners. Means they'll get an UnknownScanner
1012     // exception next time they come in.
1013     for (Map.Entry<String, RegionScanner> e : this.scanners.entrySet()) {
1014       try {
1015         e.getValue().close();
1016       } catch (IOException ioe) {
1017         LOG.warn("Closing scanner " + e.getKey(), ioe);
1018       }
1019     }
1020   }

1022   /*
1023    * Run init. Sets up hlog and starts up all server threads.
1024    *
1025    * @param c Extra configuration.
1026    */
1027   protected void handleReportForDutyResponse(final MapWritable c)
1028   throws IOException {
1029     try {
1030       for (Map.Entry<Writable, Writable> e :c.entrySet()) {
1031         String key = e.getKey().toString();
1032         // The hostname the master sees us as.
1033         if (key.equals(HConstants.KEY_FOR_HOSTNAME_SEEN_BY_MASTER)) {
1034           String hostnameFromMasterPOV = e.getValue().toString();
1035           this.serverNameFromMasterPOV = new ServerName(hostnameFromMasterPOV,
1036             this.isa.getPort(), this.startcode);
1037           LOG.info("Master passed us hostname to use. Was=" +
1038             this.isa.getHostName() + ", Now=" +
1039             this.serverNameFromMasterPOV.getHostname());
1040           continue;
1041         }
1042         String value = e.getValue().toString();
1043         if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
1044           LOG.debug("Config from master: " + key + "=" + value);
1045         }
1046         this.conf.set(key, value);
1047       }
1048 
1049       // hack! Maps DFSClient => RegionServer for logs.  HDFS made this
1050       // config param for task trackers, but we can piggyback off of it.
1051       if (this.conf.get("mapred.task.id") == null) {
1052         this.conf.set("mapred.task.id", "hb_rs_" +
1053           this.serverNameFromMasterPOV.toString());
1054       }
1055       // Set our ephemeral znode up in zookeeper now we have a name.
1056       createMyEphemeralNode();
1057 
1058       // Master sent us hbase.rootdir to use. Should be fully qualified
1059       // path with file system specification included. Set 'fs.defaultFS'
1060       // to match the filesystem on hbase.rootdir else underlying hadoop hdfs
1061       // accessors will be going against wrong filesystem (unless all is set
1062       // to defaults).
1063       this.conf.set("fs.defaultFS", this.conf.get("hbase.rootdir"));
1064       // Get fs instance used by this RS
1065       this.fs = new HFileSystem(this.conf, this.useHBaseChecksum);
1066       this.rootDir = new Path(this.conf.get(HConstants.HBASE_DIR));
1067       this.tableDescriptors = new FSTableDescriptors(this.fs, this.rootDir, true);
1068       this.hlog = setupWALAndReplication();
1069       // Init in here rather than in constructor after thread name has been set
1070       this.metrics = new RegionServerMetrics();
1071       this.dynamicMetrics = RegionServerDynamicMetrics.newInstance(this);
1072       this.rsHost = new RegionServerCoprocessorHost(this, this.conf);
1073       startServiceThreads();
1074       LOG.info("Serving as " + this.serverNameFromMasterPOV +
1075         ", RPC listening on " + this.isa +
1076         ", sessionid=0x" +
1077         Long.toHexString(this.zooKeeper.getRecoverableZooKeeper().getSessionId()));
1078       isOnline = true;
1079     } catch (Throwable e) {
1080       LOG.warn("Exception in region server : ", e);
1081       this.isOnline = false;
1082       stop("Failed initialization");
1083       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(e, "Failed init"),
1084           "Region server startup failed");
1085     } finally {
1086       sleeper.skipSleepCycle();
1087     }
1088   }

1107   /*
1108    * @param r Region to get RegionLoad for.
1109    *
1110    * @return RegionLoad instance.
1111    *
1112    * @throws IOException
1113    */
1114   private HServerLoad.RegionLoad createRegionLoad(final HRegion r) {
1115     byte[] name = r.getRegionName();
1116     int stores = 0;
1117     int storefiles = 0;
1118     int storeUncompressedSizeMB = 0;
1119     int storefileSizeMB = 0;
1120     int memstoreSizeMB = (int) (r.memstoreSize.get() / 1024 / 1024);
1121     int storefileIndexSizeMB = 0;
1122     int rootIndexSizeKB = 0;
1123     int totalStaticIndexSizeKB = 0;
1124     int totalStaticBloomSizeKB = 0;
1125     long totalCompactingKVs = 0;
1126     long currentCompactedKVs = 0;
1127     synchronized (r.stores) {
1128       stores += r.stores.size();
1129       for (Store store : r.stores.values()) {
1130         storefiles += store.getStorefilesCount();
1131         storeUncompressedSizeMB += (int) (store.getStoreSizeUncompressed()
1132             / 1024 / 1024);
1133         storefileSizeMB += (int) (store.getStorefilesSize() / 1024 / 1024);
1134         storefileIndexSizeMB += (int) (store.getStorefilesIndexSize() / 1024 / 1024);
1135         CompactionProgress progress = store.getCompactionProgress();
1136         if (progress != null) {
1137           totalCompactingKVs += progress.totalCompactingKVs;
1138           currentCompactedKVs += progress.currentCompactedKVs;
1139         }
1140 
1141         rootIndexSizeKB +=
1142             (int) (store.getStorefilesIndexSize() / 1024);
1143 
1144         totalStaticIndexSizeKB +=
1145           (int) (store.getTotalStaticIndexSize() / 1024);
1146 
1147         totalStaticBloomSizeKB +=
1148           (int) (store.getTotalStaticBloomSize() / 1024);
1149       }
1150     }
1151     return new HServerLoad.RegionLoad(name, stores, storefiles,
1152         storeUncompressedSizeMB,
1153         storefileSizeMB, memstoreSizeMB, storefileIndexSizeMB, rootIndexSizeKB,
1154         totalStaticIndexSizeKB, totalStaticBloomSizeKB,
1155         (int) r.readRequestsCount.get(), (int) r.writeRequestsCount.get(),
1156         totalCompactingKVs, currentCompactedKVs);
1157   }

1169   /*
1170    * Cleanup after Throwable caught invoking method. Converts <code>t</code> to
1171    * IOE if it isn't already.
1172    *
1173    * @param t Throwable
1174    *
1175    * @return Throwable converted to an IOE; methods can only let out IOEs.
1176    */
1177   private Throwable cleanup(final Throwable t) {
1178     return cleanup(t, null);
1179   }
1180 
1181   /*
1182    * Cleanup after Throwable caught invoking method. Converts <code>t</code> to
1183    * IOE if it isn't already.
1184    *
1185    * @param t Throwable
1186    *
1187    * @param msg Message to log in error. Can be null.
1188    *
1189    * @return Throwable converted to an IOE; methods can only let out IOEs.
1190    */
1191   private Throwable cleanup(final Throwable t, final String msg) {
1192     // Don't log as error if NSRE; NSRE is 'normal' operation.
1193     if (t instanceof NotServingRegionException) {
1194       LOG.debug("NotServingRegionException; " +  t.getMessage());
1195       return t;
1196     }
1197     if (msg == null) {
1198       LOG.error("", RemoteExceptionHandler.checkThrowable(t));
1199     } else {
1200       LOG.error(msg, RemoteExceptionHandler.checkThrowable(t));
1201     }
1202     if (!checkOOME(t)) {
1203       checkFileSystem();
1204     }
1205     return t;
1206   }
1207 
1208   /*
1209    * @param t
1210    *
1211    * @return Make <code>t</code> an IOE if it isn't already.
1212    */
1213   private IOException convertThrowableToIOE(final Throwable t) {
1214     return convertThrowableToIOE(t, null);
1215   }
1216 
1217   /*
1218    * @param t
1219    *
1220    * @param msg Message to put in new IOE if passed <code>t</code> is not an IOE
1221    *
1222    * @return Make <code>t</code> an IOE if it isn't already.
1223    */
1224   private IOException convertThrowableToIOE(final Throwable t, final String msg) {
1225     return (t instanceof IOException ? (IOException) t : msg == null
1226         || msg.length() == 0 ? new IOException(t) : new IOException(msg, t));
1227   }
1228 
1229   /*
1230    * Check if an OOME and, if so, abort immediately to avoid creating more objects.
1231    *
1232    * @param e
1233    *
1234    * @return True if we OOME'd and are aborting.
1235    */
1236   public boolean checkOOME(final Throwable e) {
1237     boolean stop = false;
1238     try {
1239       if (e instanceof OutOfMemoryError
1240           || (e.getCause() != null && e.getCause() instanceof OutOfMemoryError)
1241           || (e.getMessage() != null && e.getMessage().contains(
1242               "java.lang.OutOfMemoryError"))) {
1243         stop = true;
1244         LOG.fatal(
1245           "Run out of memory; HRegionServer will abort itself immediately", e);
1246       }
1247     } finally {
1248       if (stop) {
1249         Runtime.getRuntime().halt(1);
1250       }
1251     }
1252     return stop;
1253   }

1255   /**
1256    * Checks to see if the file system is still accessible. If not, sets
1257    * abortRequested and stopRequested
1258    *
1259    * @return false if file system is not available
1260    */
1261   public boolean checkFileSystem() {
1262     if (this.fsOk && this.fs != null) {
1263       try {
1264         FSUtils.checkFileSystemAvailable(this.fs);
1265       } catch (IOException e) {
1266         abort("File System not available", e);
1267         this.fsOk = false;
1268       }
1269     }
1270     return this.fsOk;
1271   }

1273   /*
1274    * Inner class that runs on a long period checking if regions need compaction.
1275    */
1276   private static class CompactionChecker extends Chore {
1277     private final HRegionServer instance;
1278     private final int majorCompactPriority;
1279     private final static int DEFAULT_PRIORITY = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1280 
1281     CompactionChecker(final HRegionServer h, final int sleepTime,
1282         final Stoppable stopper) {
1283       super("CompactionChecker", sleepTime, h);
1284       this.instance = h;
1285       LOG.info("Runs every " + StringUtils.formatTime(sleepTime));
1286 
1287       /* MajorCompactPriority is configurable.
1288        * If not set, the compaction will use default priority.
1289        */
1290       this.majorCompactPriority = this.instance.conf.
1291         getInt("hbase.regionserver.compactionChecker.majorCompactPriority",
1292         DEFAULT_PRIORITY);
1293     }
1294 
1295     @Override
1296     protected void chore() {
1297       for (HRegion r : this.instance.onlineRegions.values()) {
1298         if (r == null)
1299           continue;
1300         for (Store s : r.getStores().values()) {
1301           try {
1302             if (s.needsCompaction()) {
1303               // Queue a compaction. Will recognize if major is needed.
1304               this.instance.compactSplitThread.requestCompaction(r, s, getName()
1305                   + " requests compaction", null);
1306             } else if (s.isMajorCompaction()) {
1307               if (majorCompactPriority == DEFAULT_PRIORITY
1308                   || majorCompactPriority > r.getCompactPriority()) {
1309                 this.instance.compactSplitThread.requestCompaction(r, s, getName()
1310                     + " requests major compaction; use default priority", null);
1311               } else {
1312                 this.instance.compactSplitThread.requestCompaction(r, s, getName()
1313                     + " requests major compaction; use configured priority",
1314                   this.majorCompactPriority, null);
1315               }
1316             }
1317           } catch (IOException e) {
1318             LOG.warn("Failed major compaction check on " + r, e);
1319           }
1320         }
1321       }
1322     }
1323   }

1341    */

1343     final Path oldLogDir = new Path(rootDir, HConstants.HREGION_OLDLOGDIR_NAME);
1344     Path logdir = new Path(rootDir,

1350     }
1351 
1352     // Instantiate replication manager if replication enabled.  Pass it the
1353     // log directories.
1354     createNewReplicationInstance(conf, this, this.fs, logdir, oldLogDir);
1355     return instantiateHLog(logdir, oldLogDir);

1371    * Called by {@link #instantiateHLog(Path, Path)} setting up WAL instance.
1372    * Add any {@link WALActionsListener}s you want inserted before WAL startup.

1393   /*
1394    * @param interval Interval since last time metrics were called.
1395    */
1396   protected void doMetrics() {
1397     try {
1398       metrics();
1399     } catch (Throwable e) {
1400       LOG.warn("Failed metrics", e);
1401     }
1402   }
1403 
1404   protected void metrics() {
1405     this.metrics.regions.set(this.onlineRegions.size());
1406     this.metrics.incrementRequests(this.requestCount.get());
1407     this.metrics.requests.intervalHeartBeat();
1408     // Is this too expensive every three seconds getting a lock on onlineRegions
1409     // and then per store carried? Can I make metrics be sloppier and avoid
1410     // the synchronizations?
1411     int stores = 0;
1412     int storefiles = 0;
1413     long memstoreSize = 0;
1414     int readRequestsCount = 0;
1415     int writeRequestsCount = 0;
1416     long storefileIndexSize = 0;
1417     HDFSBlocksDistribution hdfsBlocksDistribution =
1418       new HDFSBlocksDistribution();
1419     long totalStaticIndexSize = 0;
1420     long totalStaticBloomSize = 0;
1421     long numPutsWithoutWAL = 0;
1422     long dataInMemoryWithoutWAL = 0;
1423     long updatesBlockedMs = 0;
1424 
1425     // Note that this is a map of Doubles instead of Longs. This is because we
1426     // do effective integer division, which would perhaps truncate more than it
1427     // should because we do it only on one part of our sum at a time. Rather
1428     // than dividing at the end, where it is difficult to know the proper
1429     // factor, everything is exact then truncated.
1430     final Map<String, MutableDouble> tempVals =
1431         new HashMap<String, MutableDouble>();
1432 
1433     for (Map.Entry<String, HRegion> e : this.onlineRegions.entrySet()) {
1434       HRegion r = e.getValue();
1435       memstoreSize += r.memstoreSize.get();
1436       numPutsWithoutWAL += r.numPutsWithoutWAL.get();
1437       dataInMemoryWithoutWAL += r.dataInMemoryWithoutWAL.get();
1438       readRequestsCount += r.readRequestsCount.get();
1439       writeRequestsCount += r.writeRequestsCount.get();
1440       updatesBlockedMs += r.updatesBlockedMs.get();
1441       synchronized (r.stores) {
1442         stores += r.stores.size();
1443         for (Map.Entry<byte[], Store> ee : r.stores.entrySet()) {
1444             final Store store = ee.getValue();
1445             final SchemaMetrics schemaMetrics = store.getSchemaMetrics();
1446 
1447             {
1448               long tmpStorefiles = store.getStorefilesCount();
1449               schemaMetrics.accumulateStoreMetric(tempVals,
1450                   StoreMetricType.STORE_FILE_COUNT, tmpStorefiles);
1451               storefiles += tmpStorefiles;
1452             }
1453 
1454 
1455             {
1456               long tmpStorefileIndexSize = store.getStorefilesIndexSize();
1457               schemaMetrics.accumulateStoreMetric(tempVals,
1458                   StoreMetricType.STORE_FILE_INDEX_SIZE,
1459                   (long) (tmpStorefileIndexSize / (1024.0 * 1024)));
1460               storefileIndexSize += tmpStorefileIndexSize;
1461             }
1462 
1463             {
1464               long tmpStorefilesSize = store.getStorefilesSize();
1465               schemaMetrics.accumulateStoreMetric(tempVals,
1466                   StoreMetricType.STORE_FILE_SIZE_MB,
1467                   (long) (tmpStorefilesSize / (1024.0 * 1024)));
1468             }
1469 
1470             {
1471               long tmpStaticBloomSize = store.getTotalStaticBloomSize();
1472               schemaMetrics.accumulateStoreMetric(tempVals,
1473                   StoreMetricType.STATIC_BLOOM_SIZE_KB,
1474                   (long) (tmpStaticBloomSize / 1024.0));
1475               totalStaticBloomSize += tmpStaticBloomSize;
1476             }
1477 
1478             {
1479               long tmpStaticIndexSize = store.getTotalStaticIndexSize();
1480               schemaMetrics.accumulateStoreMetric(tempVals,
1481                   StoreMetricType.STATIC_INDEX_SIZE_KB,
1482                   (long) (tmpStaticIndexSize / 1024.0));
1483               totalStaticIndexSize += tmpStaticIndexSize;
1484             }
1485 
1486             schemaMetrics.accumulateStoreMetric(tempVals,
1487                 StoreMetricType.MEMSTORE_SIZE_MB,
1488                 (long) (store.getMemStoreSize() / (1024.0 * 1024)));
1489         }
1490       }
1491 
1492       hdfsBlocksDistribution.add(r.getHDFSBlocksDistribution());
1493     }
1494 
1495     for (Entry<String, MutableDouble> e : tempVals.entrySet()) {
1496       RegionMetricsStorage.setNumericMetric(e.getKey(), e.getValue().longValue());
1497     }
1498 
1499     this.metrics.stores.set(stores);
1500     this.metrics.storefiles.set(storefiles);
1501     this.metrics.memstoreSizeMB.set((int) (memstoreSize / (1024 * 1024)));
1502     this.metrics.mbInMemoryWithoutWAL.set((int) (dataInMemoryWithoutWAL / (1024 * 1024)));
1503     this.metrics.numPutsWithoutWAL.set(numPutsWithoutWAL);
1504     this.metrics.storefileIndexSizeMB.set(
1505         (int) (storefileIndexSize / (1024 * 1024)));
1506     this.metrics.rootIndexSizeKB.set(
1507         (int) (storefileIndexSize / 1024));
1508     this.metrics.totalStaticIndexSizeKB.set(
1509         (int) (totalStaticIndexSize / 1024));
1510     this.metrics.totalStaticBloomSizeKB.set(
1511         (int) (totalStaticBloomSize / 1024));
1512     this.metrics.readRequestsCount.set(readRequestsCount);
1513     this.metrics.writeRequestsCount.set(writeRequestsCount);
1514     this.metrics.compactionQueueSize.set(compactSplitThread
1515         .getCompactionQueueSize());
1516     this.metrics.flushQueueSize.set(cacheFlusher
1517         .getFlushQueueSize());
1518     this.metrics.updatesBlockedSeconds.update(updatesBlockedMs > 0 ? 
1519         updatesBlockedMs/1000: 0);
1520     final long updatesBlockedMsHigherWater = cacheFlusher.getUpdatesBlockedMsHighWater().get();
1521     this.metrics.updatesBlockedSecondsHighWater.update(updatesBlockedMsHigherWater > 0 ? 
1522         updatesBlockedMsHigherWater/1000: 0);
1523 
1524     BlockCache blockCache = cacheConfig.getBlockCache();
1525     if (blockCache != null) {
1526       this.metrics.blockCacheCount.set(blockCache.size());
1527       this.metrics.blockCacheFree.set(blockCache.getFreeSize());
1528       this.metrics.blockCacheSize.set(blockCache.getCurrentSize());
1529       CacheStats cacheStats = blockCache.getStats();
1530       this.metrics.blockCacheHitCount.set(cacheStats.getHitCount());
1531       this.metrics.blockCacheMissCount.set(cacheStats.getMissCount());
1532       this.metrics.blockCacheEvictedCount.set(blockCache.getEvictedCount());
1533       double ratio = blockCache.getStats().getHitRatio();
1534       int percent = (int) (ratio * 100);
1535       this.metrics.blockCacheHitRatio.set(percent);
1536       ratio = blockCache.getStats().getHitCachingRatio();
1537       percent = (int) (ratio * 100);
1538       this.metrics.blockCacheHitCachingRatio.set(percent);
1539       // past N period block cache hit / hit caching ratios
1540       cacheStats.rollMetricsPeriod();
1541       ratio = cacheStats.getHitRatioPastNPeriods();
1542       percent = (int) (ratio * 100);
1543       this.metrics.blockCacheHitRatioPastNPeriods.set(percent);
1544       ratio = cacheStats.getHitCachingRatioPastNPeriods();
1545       percent = (int) (ratio * 100);
1546       this.metrics.blockCacheHitCachingRatioPastNPeriods.set(percent);
1547     }
1548     float localityIndex = hdfsBlocksDistribution.getBlockLocalityIndex(
1549       getServerName().getHostname());
1550     int percent = (int) (localityIndex * 100);
1551     this.metrics.hdfsBlocksLocalityIndex.set(percent);
1552 
1553   }

1569   /*
1570    * Start maintanence Threads, Server, Worker and lease checker threads.
1571    * Install an UncaughtExceptionHandler that calls abort of RegionServer if we
1572    * get an unhandled exception. We cannot set the handler on all threads.
1573    * Server's internal Listener thread is off limits. For Server, if an OOME, it
1574    * waits a while then retries. Meantime, a flush or a compaction that tries to
1575    * run should trigger same critical condition and the shutdown will run. On
1576    * its way out, this server will shut down Server. Leases are sort of
1577    * inbetween. It has an internal thread that while it inherits from Chore, it
1578    * keeps its own internal stop mechanism so needs to be stopped by this
1579    * hosting server. Worker logs the exception and exits.
1580    */
1581   private void startServiceThreads() throws IOException {
1582     String n = Thread.currentThread().getName();
1583     UncaughtExceptionHandler handler = new UncaughtExceptionHandler() {
1584       public void uncaughtException(Thread t, Throwable e) {
1585         abort("Uncaught exception in service thread " + t.getName(), e);
1586       }
1587     };
1588 
1589     // Start executor services
1590     this.service = new ExecutorService(getServerName().toString());
1591     this.service.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.RS_OPEN_REGION,
1592       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.executor.openregion.threads", 3));
1593     this.service.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.RS_OPEN_ROOT,
1594       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.executor.openroot.threads", 1));
1595     this.service.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.RS_OPEN_META,
1596       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.executor.openmeta.threads", 1));
1597     this.service.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.RS_CLOSE_REGION,
1598       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.executor.closeregion.threads", 3));
1599     this.service.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.RS_CLOSE_ROOT,
1600       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.executor.closeroot.threads", 1));
1601     this.service.startExecutorService(ExecutorType.RS_CLOSE_META,
1602       conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.executor.closemeta.threads", 1));
1603 
1604     Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(this.hlogRoller.getThread(), n + ".logRoller", handler);
1605     Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(this.cacheFlusher.getThread(), n + ".cacheFlusher",
1606       handler);
1607     Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(this.compactionChecker.getThread(), n +
1608       ".compactionChecker", handler);
1609     if (this.healthCheckChore != null) {
1610       Threads.setDaemonThreadRunning(this.healthCheckChore.getThread(), n + ".healthChecker",
1611         handler);
1612     }
1613 
1614     // Leases is not a Thread. Internally it runs a daemon thread. If it gets
1615     // an unhandled exception, it will just exit.
1616     this.leases.setName(n + ".leaseChecker");
1617     this.leases.start();
1618 
1619     // Put up the webui.  Webui may come up on port other than configured if
1620     // that port is occupied. Adjust serverInfo if this is the case.
1621     this.webuiport = putUpWebUI();
1622 
1623     if (this.replicationSourceHandler == this.replicationSinkHandler &&
1624         this.replicationSourceHandler != null) {
1625       this.replicationSourceHandler.startReplicationService();
1626     } else if (this.replicationSourceHandler != null) {
1627       this.replicationSourceHandler.startReplicationService();
1628     } else if (this.replicationSinkHandler != null) {
1629       this.replicationSinkHandler.startReplicationService();
1630     }
1631 
1632     // Start Server.  This service is like leases in that it internally runs
1633     // a thread.
1634     this.rpcServer.start();
1635 
1636     // Create the log splitting worker and start it
1637     this.splitLogWorker = new SplitLogWorker(this.zooKeeper,
1638         this.getConfiguration(), this.getServerName().toString());
1639     splitLogWorker.start();
1640     
1641   }
1642 
1643   /**
1644    * Puts up the webui.
1645    * @return Returns final port -- maybe different from what we started with.
1646    * @throws IOException
1647    */
1648   private int putUpWebUI() throws IOException {
1649     int port = this.conf.getInt("hbase.regionserver.info.port", 60030);
1650     // -1 is for disabling info server
1651     if (port < 0) return port;
1652     String addr = this.conf.get("hbase.regionserver.info.bindAddress", "0.0.0.0");
1653     // check if auto port bind enabled
1654     boolean auto = this.conf.getBoolean(HConstants.REGIONSERVER_INFO_PORT_AUTO,
1655         false);
1656     while (true) {
1657       try {
1658         this.infoServer = new InfoServer("regionserver", addr, port, false, this.conf);
1659         this.infoServer.addServlet("status", "/rs-status", RSStatusServlet.class);
1660         this.infoServer.addServlet("dump", "/dump", RSDumpServlet.class);
1661         this.infoServer.setAttribute(REGIONSERVER, this);
1662         this.infoServer.setAttribute(REGIONSERVER_CONF, conf);
1663         this.infoServer.start();
1664         break;
1665       } catch (BindException e) {
1666         if (!auto) {
1667           // auto bind disabled throw BindException
1668           throw e;
1669         }
1670         // auto bind enabled, try to use another port
1671         LOG.info("Failed binding http info server to port: " + port);
1672         port++;
1673       }
1674     }
1675     return port;
1676   }

1678   /*
1679    * Verify that server is healthy
1680    */
1681   private boolean isHealthy() {
1682     if (!fsOk) {
1683       // File system problem
1684       return false;
1685     }
1686     // Verify that all threads are alive
1687     if (!(leases.isAlive()
1688         && cacheFlusher.isAlive() && hlogRoller.isAlive()
1689         && this.compactionChecker.isAlive())) {
1690       stop("One or more threads are no longer alive -- stop");
1691       return false;
1692     }
1693     return true;
1694   }

1706   @Override
1707   public void stop(final String msg) {
1708     try {
1709       this.rsHost.preStop(msg);
1710       this.stopped = true;
1711       LOG.info("STOPPED: " + msg);
1712       // Wakes run() if it is sleeping
1713       sleeper.skipSleepCycle();
1714     } catch (IOException exp) {
1715       LOG.warn("The region server did not stop", exp);
1716     }
1717   }

1720     while (!isOnline() && !isStopped()){
1721        sleeper.sleep();

1725   @Override
1726   public void postOpenDeployTasks(final HRegion r, final CatalogTracker ct,
1727       final boolean daughter)
1728   throws KeeperException, IOException {
1729     checkOpen();
1730     LOG.info("Post open deploy tasks for region=" + r.getRegionNameAsString() +
1731       ", daughter=" + daughter);
1732     // Do checks to see if we need to compact (references or too many files)
1733     for (Store s : r.getStores().values()) {
1734       if (s.hasReferences() || s.needsCompaction()) {
1735         getCompactionRequester().requestCompaction(r, s, "Opening Region", null);
1736       }
1737     }
1738     // Update ZK, ROOT or META
1739     if (r.getRegionInfo().isRootRegion()) {
1740       RootLocationEditor.setRootLocation(getZooKeeper(),
1741        this.serverNameFromMasterPOV);
1742     } else if (r.getRegionInfo().isMetaRegion()) {
1743       MetaEditor.updateMetaLocation(ct, r.getRegionInfo(),
1744         this.serverNameFromMasterPOV);
1745     } else {
1746       if (daughter) {
1747         // If daughter of a split, update whole row, not just location.
1748         MetaEditor.addDaughter(ct, r.getRegionInfo(),
1749           this.serverNameFromMasterPOV);
1750       } else {
1751         MetaEditor.updateRegionLocation(ct, r.getRegionInfo(),
1752           this.serverNameFromMasterPOV);
1753       }
1754     }
1755     LOG.info("Done with post open deploy task for region=" +
1756       r.getRegionNameAsString() + ", daughter=" + daughter);
1757 
1758   }

1773   /**
1774    * Cause the server to exit without closing the regions it is serving, the log
1775    * it is using and without notifying the master. Used unit testing and on
1776    * catastrophic events such as HDFS is yanked out from under hbase or we OOME.
1777    *
1778    * @param reason
1779    *          the reason we are aborting
1780    * @param cause
1781    *          the exception that caused the abort, or null
1782    */
1783   public void abort(String reason, Throwable cause) {
1784     String msg = "ABORTING region server " + this + ": " + reason;
1785     if (cause != null) {
1786       LOG.fatal(msg, cause);
1787     } else {
1788       LOG.fatal(msg);
1789     }
1790     this.abortRequested = true;
1791     this.reservedSpace.clear();
1792     // HBASE-4014: show list of coprocessors that were loaded to help debug
1793     // regionserver crashes.Note that we're implicitly using
1794     // java.util.HashSet's toString() method to print the coprocessor names.
1795     LOG.fatal("RegionServer abort: loaded coprocessors are: " +
1796         CoprocessorHost.getLoadedCoprocessors());
1797     if (this.metrics != null) {
1798       LOG.info("Dump of metrics: " + this.metrics);
1799     }
1800     // Do our best to report our abort to the master, but this may not work
1801     try {
1802       if (cause != null) {
1803         msg += "\nCause:\n" + StringUtils.stringifyException(cause);
1804       }
1805       if (hbaseMaster != null) {
1806         hbaseMaster.reportRSFatalError(
1807             this.serverNameFromMasterPOV.getVersionedBytes(), msg);
1808       }
1809     } catch (Throwable t) {
1810       LOG.warn("Unable to report fatal error to master", t);
1811     }
1812     stop(reason);
1813   }
1814 
1815   /**
1816    * @see HRegionServer#abort(String, Throwable)
1817    */
1818   public void abort(String reason) {
1819     abort(reason, null);
1820   }

1823     return this.abortRequested;

1826   /*
1827    * Simulate a kill -9 of this server. Exits w/o closing regions or cleaninup
1828    * logs but it does close socket in case want to bring up server on old
1829    * hostname+port immediately.
1830    */
1831   protected void kill() {
1832     this.killed = true;
1833     abort("Simulated kill");
1834   }
1835 
1836   /**
1837    * Wait on all threads to finish. Presumption is that all closes and stops
1838    * have already been called.
1839    */
1840   protected void join() {
1841     Threads.shutdown(this.compactionChecker.getThread());
1842     Threads.shutdown(this.cacheFlusher.getThread());
1843     if (this.healthCheckChore != null) {
1844       Threads.shutdown(this.healthCheckChore.getThread());
1845     }
1846     if (this.hlogRoller != null) {
1847       Threads.shutdown(this.hlogRoller.getThread());
1848     }
1849     if (this.compactSplitThread != null) {
1850       this.compactSplitThread.join();
1851     }
1852     if (this.service != null) this.service.shutdown();
1853     if (this.replicationSourceHandler != null &&
1854         this.replicationSourceHandler == this.replicationSinkHandler) {
1855       this.replicationSourceHandler.stopReplicationService();
1856     } else if (this.replicationSourceHandler != null) {
1857       this.replicationSourceHandler.stopReplicationService();
1858     } else if (this.replicationSinkHandler != null) {
1859       this.replicationSinkHandler.stopReplicationService();
1860     }
1861   }

1879   /**
1880    * Get the current master from ZooKeeper and open the RPC connection to it.
1881    *
1882    * Method will block until a master is available. You can break from this
1883    * block by requesting the server stop.
1884    *
1885    * @return master + port, or null if server has been stopped
1886    */
1887   private ServerName getMaster() {
1888     ServerName masterServerName = null;
1889     long previousLogTime = 0;
1890     HMasterRegionInterface master = null;
1891     InetSocketAddress masterIsa = null;
1892     while (keepLooping() && master == null) {
1893       masterServerName = this.masterAddressManager.getMasterAddress();
1894       if (masterServerName == null) {
1895         if (!keepLooping()) {
1896           // give up with no connection.
1897           LOG.debug("No master found and cluster is stopped; bailing out");
1898           return null;
1899         }
1900         LOG.debug("No master found; retry");
1901         previousLogTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
1902 
1903         sleeper.sleep();
1904         continue;
1905       }
1906 
1907       masterIsa =
1908         new InetSocketAddress(masterServerName.getHostname(), masterServerName.getPort());
1909 
1910       LOG.info("Attempting connect to Master server at " +
1911         this.masterAddressManager.getMasterAddress());
1912       try {
1913         // Do initial RPC setup. The final argument indicates that the RPC
1914         // should retry indefinitely.
1915         master = HBaseRPC.waitForProxy(this.rpcEngine,
1916             HMasterRegionInterface.class, HMasterRegionInterface.VERSION,
1917             masterIsa, this.conf, -1,
1918             this.rpcTimeout, this.rpcTimeout);
1919       } catch (IOException e) {
1920         e = e instanceof RemoteException ?
1921             ((RemoteException)e).unwrapRemoteException() : e;
1922         if (e instanceof ServerNotRunningYetException) {
1923           if (System.currentTimeMillis() > (previousLogTime+1000)){
1924             LOG.info("Master isn't available yet, retrying");
1925             previousLogTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
1926           }
1927         } else {
1928           if (System.currentTimeMillis() > (previousLogTime + 1000)) {
1929             LOG.warn("Unable to connect to master. Retrying. Error was:", e);
1930             previousLogTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
1931           }
1932         }
1933         try {
1934           Thread.sleep(200);
1935         } catch (InterruptedException ignored) {
1936         }
1937       }
1938     }
1939     LOG.info("Connected to master at " + masterIsa);
1940     this.hbaseMaster = master;
1941     return masterServerName;
1942   }
1943 
1944   /**
1945    * @return True if we should break loop because cluster is going down or
1946    * this server has been stopped or hdfs has gone bad.
1947    */
1948   private boolean keepLooping() {
1949     return !this.stopped && isClusterUp();
1950   }
1951 
1952   /*
1953    * Let the master know we're here Run initialization using parameters passed
1954    * us by the master.
1955    * @return A Map of key/value configurations we got from the Master else
1956    * null if we failed to register.
1957    * @throws IOException
1958    */
1959   private MapWritable reportForDuty() throws IOException {
1960     MapWritable result = null;
1961     ServerName masterServerName = getMaster();
1962     if (masterServerName == null) return result;
1963     try {
1964       this.requestCount.set(0);
1965       LOG.info("Telling master at " + masterServerName + " that we are up " +
1966         "with port=" + this.isa.getPort() + ", startcode=" + this.startcode);
1967       long now = EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTimeMillis();
1968       int port = this.isa.getPort();
1969       result = this.hbaseMaster.regionServerStartup(port, this.startcode, now);
1970     } catch (RemoteException e) {
1971       IOException ioe = e.unwrapRemoteException();
1972       if (ioe instanceof ClockOutOfSyncException) {
1973         LOG.fatal("Master rejected startup because clock is out of sync", ioe);
1974         // Re-throw IOE will cause RS to abort
1975         throw ioe;
1976       } else {
1977         LOG.warn("remote error telling master we are up", e);
1978       }
1979     } catch (IOException e) {
1980       LOG.warn("error telling master we are up", e);
1981     }
1982     return result;
1983   }

1985   /**
1986    * Closes all regions.  Called on our way out.
1987    * Assumes that its not possible for new regions to be added to onlineRegions
1988    * while this method runs.
1989    */
1990   protected void closeAllRegions(final boolean abort) {
1991     closeUserRegions(abort);
1992     closeMetaTableRegions(abort);
1993   }

1995   /**
1996    * Close root and meta regions if we carry them
1997    * @param abort Whether we're running an abort.
1998    */
1999   void closeMetaTableRegions(final boolean abort) {
2000     HRegion meta = null;
2001     HRegion root = null;
2002     this.lock.writeLock().lock();
2003     try {
2004       for (Map.Entry<String, HRegion> e: onlineRegions.entrySet()) {
2005         HRegionInfo hri = e.getValue().getRegionInfo();
2006         if (hri.isRootRegion()) {
2007           root = e.getValue();
2008         } else if (hri.isMetaRegion()) {
2009           meta = e.getValue();
2010         }
2011         if (meta != null && root != null) break;
2012       }
2013     } finally {
2014       this.lock.writeLock().unlock();
2015     }
2016     if (meta != null) closeRegion(meta.getRegionInfo(), abort, false);
2017     if (root != null) closeRegion(root.getRegionInfo(), abort, false);
2018   }

2020   /**
2021    * Schedule closes on all user regions.
2022    * Should be safe calling multiple times because it wont' close regions
2023    * that are already closed or that are closing.
2024    * @param abort Whether we're running an abort.
2025    */
2026   void closeUserRegions(final boolean abort) {
2027     this.lock.writeLock().lock();
2028     try {
2029       for (Map.Entry<String, HRegion> e: this.onlineRegions.entrySet()) {
2030         HRegion r = e.getValue();
2031         if (!r.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable() && r.isAvailable()) {
2032           // Don't update zk with this close transition; pass false.
2033           closeRegion(r.getRegionInfo(), abort, false);
2034         }
2035       }
2036     } finally {
2037       this.lock.writeLock().unlock();
2038     }
2039   }

2101   public void put(final byte[] regionName, final Put put) throws IOException {
2102     if (put.getRow() == null) {
2103       throw new IllegalArgumentException("update has null row");
2104     }
2105

2107     this.requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2108     HRegion region = getRegion(regionName);
2109     try {
2110       if (!region.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable()) {
2111         this.cacheFlusher.reclaimMemStoreMemory();
2112       }
2113       boolean writeToWAL = put.getWriteToWAL();
2114       region.put(put, getLockFromId(put.getLockId()), writeToWAL);
2115     } catch (Throwable t) {

2120   public int put(final byte[] regionName, final List<Put> puts)
2121       throws IOException {
2122     checkOpen();
2123     HRegion region = null;
2124     int i = 0;
2125 
2126     try {
2127       region = getRegion(regionName);
2128       if (!region.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable()) {
2129         this.cacheFlusher.reclaimMemStoreMemory();
2130       }
2131 
2132       @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
2133       Pair<Mutation, Integer>[] putsWithLocks = new Pair[puts.size()];
2134 
2135       for (Put p : puts) {
2136         Integer lock = getLockFromId(p.getLockId());
2137         putsWithLocks[i++] = new Pair<Mutation, Integer>(p, lock);
2138       }
2139 
2140       this.requestCount.addAndGet(puts.size());
2141       OperationStatus codes[] = region.batchMutate(putsWithLocks);
2142       for (i = 0; i < codes.length; i++) {
2143         if (codes[i].getOperationStatusCode() != OperationStatusCode.SUCCESS) {
2144           return i;
2145         }
2146       }
2147       return -1;
2148     } catch (Throwable t) {
2149       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t));
2150     }
2151   }

2207         qualifier, CompareOp.EQUAL, comparator, put, result);

2403   public long openScanner(byte[] regionName, Scan scan) throws IOException {
2404     checkOpen();
2405     NullPointerException npe = null;
2406     if (regionName == null) {
2407       npe = new NullPointerException("regionName is null");
2408     } else if (scan == null) {
2409       npe = new NullPointerException("scan is null");
2410     }
2411     if (npe != null) {
2412       throw new IOException("Invalid arguments to openScanner", npe);
2413     }
2414     requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2415     try {
2416       HRegion r = getRegion(regionName);
2417       r.checkRow(scan.getStartRow(), "Scan");
2418       scan.setLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand(r.isLoadingCfsOnDemandDefault()
2419           || scan.doLoadColumnFamiliesOnDemand());
2420       r.prepareScanner(scan);
2421       RegionScanner s = null;
2422       if (r.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2423         s = r.getCoprocessorHost().preScannerOpen(scan);
2424       }
2425       if (s == null) {
2426         s = r.getScanner(scan);
2427       }
2428       if (r.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2429         RegionScanner savedScanner = r.getCoprocessorHost().postScannerOpen(
2430             scan, s);
2431         if (savedScanner == null) {
2432           LOG.warn("PostScannerOpen impl returning null. "
2433               + "Check the RegionObserver implementation.");
2434         } else {
2435           s = savedScanner;
2436         }
2437       }
2438       return addScanner(s);
2439     } catch (Throwable t) {
2440       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t, "Failed openScanner"));
2441     }
2442   }
2443 
2444   protected long addScanner(RegionScanner s) throws LeaseStillHeldException {
2445     long scannerId = -1L;
2446     scannerId = rand.nextLong();
2447     String scannerName = String.valueOf(scannerId);
2448     scanners.put(scannerName, s);
2449     this.leases.createLease(scannerName, new ScannerListener(scannerName));
2450     return scannerId;
2451   }
2452 
2453   public Result next(final long scannerId) throws IOException {
2454     Result[] res = next(scannerId, 1);
2455     if (res == null || res.length == 0) {
2456       return null;
2457     }
2458     return res[0];
2459   }
2460 
2461   public Result[] next(final long scannerId, int nbRows) throws IOException {
2462     String scannerName = String.valueOf(scannerId);
2463     RegionScanner s = this.scanners.get(scannerName);
2464     if (s == null) throw new UnknownScannerException("Name: " + scannerName);
2465     try {
2466       checkOpen();
2467     } catch (IOException e) {
2468       // If checkOpen failed, server not running or filesystem gone,
2469       // cancel this lease; filesystem is gone or we're closing or something.
2470       try {
2471         this.leases.cancelLease(scannerName);
2472       } catch (LeaseException le) {
2473         LOG.info("Server shutting down and client tried to access missing scanner " +
2474           scannerName);
2475       }
2476       throw e;
2477     }
2478     Leases.Lease lease = null;
2479     try {
2480       // Remove lease while its being processed in server; protects against case
2481       // where processing of request takes > lease expiration time.
2482       lease = this.leases.removeLease(scannerName);
2483       List<Result> results = new ArrayList<Result>(nbRows);
2484       long currentScanResultSize = 0;
2485       List<KeyValue> values = new ArrayList<KeyValue>();
2486 
2487       // Call coprocessor. Get region info from scanner.
2488       HRegion region = getRegion(s.getRegionInfo().getRegionName());
2489       if (region != null && region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2490         Boolean bypass = region.getCoprocessorHost().preScannerNext(s,
2491             results, nbRows);
2492         if (!results.isEmpty()) {
2493           for (Result r : results) {
2494             for (KeyValue kv : r.raw()) {
2495               currentScanResultSize += kv.heapSize();
2496             }
2497           }
2498         }
2499         if (bypass != null) {
2500           return s.isFilterDone() && results.isEmpty() ? null
2501               : results.toArray(new Result[0]);
2502         }
2503       }
2504 
2505       MultiVersionConsistencyControl.setThreadReadPoint(s.getMvccReadPoint());
2506       region.startRegionOperation();
2507       try {
2508         int i = 0;
2509         synchronized(s) {
2510           for (; i < nbRows
2511               && currentScanResultSize < maxScannerResultSize; i++) {
2512             // Collect values to be returned here
2513             boolean moreRows = s.nextRaw(values, SchemaMetrics.METRIC_NEXTSIZE);
2514             if (!values.isEmpty()) {
2515               for (KeyValue kv : values) {
2516                 currentScanResultSize += kv.heapSize();
2517               }
2518               results.add(new Result(values));
2519             }
2520             if (!moreRows) {
2521               break;
2522             }
2523             values.clear();
2524           }
2525         }
2526         requestCount.addAndGet(i);
2527         region.readRequestsCount.add(i);
2528         region.setOpMetricsReadRequestCount(region.readRequestsCount.get());
2529       } finally {
2530         region.closeRegionOperation();
2531       }
2532       // coprocessor postNext hook
2533       if (region != null && region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2534         region.getCoprocessorHost().postScannerNext(s, results, nbRows, true);
2535       }
2536 
2537       // If the scanner's filter - if any - is done with the scan
2538       // and wants to tell the client to stop the scan. This is done by passing
2539       // a null result.
2540       return s.isFilterDone() && results.isEmpty() ? null
2541           : results.toArray(new Result[0]);
2542     } catch (Throwable t) {
2543       if (t instanceof NotServingRegionException) {
2544         this.scanners.remove(scannerName);
2545       }
2546       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t));
2547     } finally {
2548       // We're done. On way out readd the above removed lease.  Adding resets
2549       // expiration time on lease.
2550       if (this.scanners.containsKey(scannerName)) {
2551         if (lease != null) this.leases.addLease(lease);
2552       }
2553     }
2554   }
2555 
2556   public void close(final long scannerId) throws IOException {
2557     try {
2558       checkOpen();
2559       requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2560       String scannerName = String.valueOf(scannerId);
2561       RegionScanner s = scanners.get(scannerName);
2562 
2563       HRegion region = null;
2564       if (s != null) {
2565         // call coprocessor.
2566         region = getRegion(s.getRegionInfo().getRegionName());
2567         if (region != null && region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2568           if (region.getCoprocessorHost().preScannerClose(s)) {
2569             return; // bypass
2570           }
2571         }
2572       }
2573 
2574       s = scanners.remove(scannerName);
2575       if (s != null) {
2576         s.close();
2577         this.leases.cancelLease(scannerName);
2578 
2579         if (region != null && region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2580           region.getCoprocessorHost().postScannerClose(s);
2581         }
2582       }
2583     } catch (Throwable t) {
2584       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t));
2585     }
2586   }

2588   /**
2589    * Instantiated as a scanner lease. If the lease times out, the scanner is
2590    * closed
2591    */
2592   private class ScannerListener implements LeaseListener {
2593     private final String scannerName;
2594 
2595     ScannerListener(final String n) {
2596       this.scannerName = n;
2597     }
2598 
2599     public void leaseExpired() {
2600       RegionScanner s = scanners.remove(this.scannerName);
2601       if (s != null) {
2602         LOG.info("Scanner " + this.scannerName + " lease expired on region "
2603             + s.getRegionInfo().getRegionNameAsString());
2604         try {
2605           HRegion region = getRegion(s.getRegionInfo().getRegionName());
2606           if (region != null && region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2607             region.getCoprocessorHost().preScannerClose(s);
2608           }
2609 
2610           s.close();
2611           if (region != null && region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2612             region.getCoprocessorHost().postScannerClose(s);
2613           }
2614         } catch (IOException e) {
2615           LOG.error("Closing scanner for "
2616               + s.getRegionInfo().getRegionNameAsString(), e);
2617         }
2618       } else {
2619         LOG.info("Scanner " + this.scannerName + " lease expired");
2620       }
2621     }
2622   }

2625   // Methods that do the actual work for the remote API
2626   //
2627   public void delete(final byte[] regionName, final Delete delete)
2628       throws IOException {
2629     checkOpen();
2630     try {
2631       boolean writeToWAL = delete.getWriteToWAL();
2632       this.requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2633       HRegion region = getRegion(regionName);
2634       if (!region.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable()) {
2635         this.cacheFlusher.reclaimMemStoreMemory();
2636       }
2637       Integer lid = getLockFromId(delete.getLockId());
2638       region.delete(delete, lid, writeToWAL);
2639     } catch (Throwable t) {
2640       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t));
2641     }
2642   }
2643 
2644   public int delete(final byte[] regionName, final List<Delete> deletes)
2645       throws IOException {
2646     checkOpen();
2647     // Count of Deletes processed.
2648     int i = 0;
2649     HRegion region = null;
2650     try {
2651       region = getRegion(regionName);
2652       if (!region.getRegionInfo().isMetaTable()) {
2653         this.cacheFlusher.reclaimMemStoreMemory();
2654       }
2655       int size = deletes.size();
2656       Integer[] locks = new Integer[size];
2657       for (Delete delete : deletes) {
2658         this.requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2659         locks[i] = getLockFromId(delete.getLockId());
2660         region.delete(delete, locks[i], delete.getWriteToWAL());
2661         i++;
2662       }
2663     } catch (WrongRegionException ex) {
2664       LOG.debug("Batch deletes: " + i, ex);
2665       return i;
2666     } catch (NotServingRegionException ex) {
2667       return i;
2668     } catch (Throwable t) {
2669       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t));
2670     }
2671     return -1;
2672   }

2674   /**
2675    * @deprecated {@link RowLock} and associated operations are deprecated.
2676    */
2677   public long lockRow(byte[] regionName, byte[] row) throws IOException {
2678     checkOpen();
2679     NullPointerException npe = null;
2680     if (regionName == null) {
2681       npe = new NullPointerException("regionName is null");
2682     } else if (row == null) {
2683       npe = new NullPointerException("row to lock is null");
2684     }
2685     if (npe != null) {
2686       IOException io = new IOException("Invalid arguments to lockRow");
2687       io.initCause(npe);
2688       throw io;
2689     }
2690     requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2691     try {
2692       HRegion region = getRegion(regionName);
2693       if (region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2694         region.getCoprocessorHost().preLockRow(regionName, row);
2695       }
2696       Integer r = region.obtainRowLock(row);
2697       long lockId = addRowLock(r, region);
2698       LOG.debug("Row lock " + lockId + " explicitly acquired by client");
2699       return lockId;
2700     } catch (Throwable t) {
2701       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t, "Error obtaining row lock (fsOk: "
2702           + this.fsOk + ")"));
2703     }
2704   }
2705 
2706   protected long addRowLock(Integer r, HRegion region)
2707       throws LeaseStillHeldException {
2708     long lockId = -1L;
2709     lockId = rand.nextLong();
2710     String lockName = String.valueOf(lockId);
2711     rowlocks.put(lockName, r);
2712     this.leases.createLease(lockName, new RowLockListener(lockName, region));
2713     return lockId;
2714   }
2715 
2716   /**
2717    * Method to get the Integer lock identifier used internally from the long
2718    * lock identifier used by the client.
2719    *
2720    * @param lockId
2721    *          long row lock identifier from client
2722    * @return intId Integer row lock used internally in HRegion
2723    * @throws IOException
2724    *           Thrown if this is not a valid client lock id.
2725    */
2726   Integer getLockFromId(long lockId) throws IOException {
2727     if (lockId == -1L) {
2728       return null;
2729     }
2730     String lockName = String.valueOf(lockId);
2731     Integer rl = rowlocks.get(lockName);
2732     if (rl == null) {
2733       throw new UnknownRowLockException("Invalid row lock");
2734     }
2735     this.leases.renewLease(lockName);
2736     return rl;
2737   }

2739   /**
2740    * @deprecated {@link RowLock} and associated operations are deprecated.
2741    */
2742   @Override
2743   @QosPriority(priority=HConstants.HIGH_QOS)
2744   public void unlockRow(byte[] regionName, long lockId) throws IOException {
2745     checkOpen();
2746     NullPointerException npe = null;
2747     if (regionName == null) {
2748       npe = new NullPointerException("regionName is null");
2749     } else if (lockId == -1L) {
2750       npe = new NullPointerException("lockId is null");
2751     }
2752     if (npe != null) {
2753       IOException io = new IOException("Invalid arguments to unlockRow");
2754       io.initCause(npe);
2755       throw io;
2756     }
2757     requestCount.incrementAndGet();
2758     try {
2759       HRegion region = getRegion(regionName);
2760       if (region.getCoprocessorHost() != null) {
2761         region.getCoprocessorHost().preUnLockRow(regionName, lockId);
2762       }
2763       String lockName = String.valueOf(lockId);
2764       Integer r = rowlocks.remove(lockName);
2765       if (r == null) {
2766         throw new UnknownRowLockException(lockName);
2767       }
2768       region.releaseRowLock(r);
2769       this.leases.cancelLease(lockName);
2770       LOG.debug("Row lock " + lockId
2771           + " has been explicitly released by client");
2772     } catch (Throwable t) {
2773       throw convertThrowableToIOE(cleanup(t));
2774     }
2775   }
